name: Lumus
description:
Made in about 10 days for Game Jaaj 6

You are Dara, the latest experiment made out of the Abu'Dah species, enslaved, cloned to immortality and genetically modified by the intergalactic megacorporate empire, you're put into a fight against their defense forces while destroying energy draining machines at the world's end, the revolution starts now.

Lumus Watches.

Controls:

WASD: Character movement

Mouse: Aiming

Left Click: Shoot

E: Interact

Soundtrack:

_FrAvRio · LUMUS

Credits:

Artists

_FrAvRio

PalmeriEye

Programmers

Ahopness

Grand Ed (Myself!)

All developers, to some extent, have influenced in some way the game's design, themes, tones and inspirations
